column4: Verify if a user can log in using valid username and valid password.
column6:
1. Open Chrome browser.
2. Enter URL.
3. Enter valid username.
4. Enter valid password.
5. Click "Login".
column7:
1. Url: https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login
2. Valid Username: Admin
3. Valid Password: admin123

column4: Verify if a user can log in using invalid username and valid password.
column6:
1. Open Chrome browser
2. Enter URL
3. Enter an invalid username
4. Enter a valid password
5. Click "Login"
column7:
1. Url: https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login
2. Invalid Username: admin
3. Valid Password: admin123
column9: User will fail to log in and an error message: "Invalid credentials" will be displayed.

column4: Verify if a user can log in using valid username and invalid password.
column6:
1. Open Chrome browser
2. Enter URL
3. Enter a valid username
4. Enter an invalid password
5. Click "Login"
column7:

column9: User will fail to log in and an error message: "Invalid credentials" will be displayed.

column4: Verify if a user can log in with valid username and blank password.
column6:
1. Open Chrome browser
2. Enter URL
3. Enter a valid username
4. Leave the password field blank
5. Click "Login"
column8: Login failed, and an error message "Required" was displayed below the Password field.
column9: The Login button will be disabled, and a "Required" error message will appear below the Password field.

column4: Verify if a user can log in with blank username and valid password.
column6:
1. Open Chrome browser
2. Enter URL
3. Leave the username field blank
4. Enter a valid password
5. Click "Login"
column8: Login failed, and an error message "Required" was displayed below the Username field.
column9: The Login button will be disabled, and a "Required" error message will appear below the Username field.

column4: Verify if a user can log in with blank username and blank password
column6:
1. Open Chrome browser
2. Enter URL
3. Leave the username field blank
4. Leave the password field blank
5. Click "Login"
column8: Login failed, and an error message "Required" was displayed below the Username & Password fields.
column9: The Login button will be disabled, and a "Required" error message will appear below Username & Password fields.

column4: Verify if a user can apply for leave with valid information
column6:
1. Open Chrome browser
2. Enter URL
3. Login to Orange HRM
4. Go to Leave Menu
5. Select Apply
6. Select Valid Leave Type
7. Select Valid Date (From & To)
8. Select Valid Duration
9. Write Valid Comment
10. Click on "Apply"
column7:
1. Url: https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login
2. Valid Username: Admin
3. Valid Password: admin123
4. Leave Type: CAN-FMLA
5. Date: 2024-29-11 
6. Duration: Full Day
7. Comments: Personal
